name: Signed Graphic Novel "My Boyfriend is a Monster: I Date Dead People"
description: Signed copy of the graphic novel "I Date Dead People", from the series "My Boyfriend is a Monster" by Lerner Publishing Group. Author: Ann Kerns Illustrations: Janina Görrissen There are only 3 of these available - each with a different original drawing inside (you can choose between Nora, Tom and Nick) and of course, signed. If you'd like me to write you a little dedication, just let me know! 128 pages, softcover. 13,5 x 19 cm. Pentel illustration. More info on the graphic novel here.

name: Original Painting "Year of the Dragon"
description:
Original watercolor painting.

15 x 20 cm. 
Watercolor on 300 g/m² Fabriano watercolor paper.

All items are sent in a protective plastic bag and a rigid envelope to ensure their protection.

name: Signed Graphic Novel "Black is for Beginnings"
description: Signed copy of the graphic novel "Black is for Beginnings". Author: Laurie F. Stolarz Script: Barbara Randall Kesel Illustrations: Janina Görrissen There are only 3 of these available - each with a different original drawing inside (you can choose between Stacey, Amber and Drea) and of course, signed. If you'd like me to write you a little dedication, just let me know! 168 pages, softcover. 13 x 20,3 cm. Pentel illustration. More info on the graphic novel here.
